Series.Overview: Sookie Stackhouse is a telepathic waitress who lives in a small, Louisiana town that just happens to be cohabitated by both humans and vampires. After a Japanese company successfully comes up with a synthetic blood for vampires to live on, it becomes possible for humans to share the world with the bloodsuckers. Even still, it's no easy thing when Sookie finds herself harboring feelings for one charming undead fellow, named Bill.
A special featurette about the all-new HBO drama series True Blood.
